title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A neighbor or colleague benefits from your practical attention and care today. Perhaps you worry about crossing a line when you spot someone who appears to struggle and needs your help. However, offering your assistance opens the door to a human connection. Listen closely to the response you receive and allow their words to guide your actions. You may experience a minor inconvenience to your own plans, but reaching out is more meaningful than anything else you can do. You never know when you might need similar support in return. What goes around comes around, and kindness keeps the world turning. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
